plot outline: Two friends, Satyavan and Chandra, see through their childhood dream of setting up a tamasha group and gain fame quickly. They soon introduce a new member to the groupr. While they grow professionally, their personal lives change due to a decision Chandra takes.
title: Chhand Priticha
plot: Two friends, Satyavan and Chandra, see through their childhood dream of setting up a tamasha group and gain fame quickly. They soon introduce a new member to the groupr. While they grow professionally, their personal lives change due to a decision Chandra takes.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
